cards.flavor: “This ex-Judge should not be underestimated. Be prepared for anything, and expect to be wrong.”
cards.name: Axom, the Drifter
cards.originalText:
Flash
When Axom enters the battlefield, remove up to three counters from target permanent.
{2}{U}: Return Axom to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: “Wanted for assault and propagation of witchcraft. Slingers should be wary of it and its subjects’ use of anti-magic witchery.”
cards.name: Burning-Tree Shaman
cards.originalText: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.
cards.text: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.

cards.name: Chief Striking Dawn
cards.originalText:
Whenever a card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Chief Striking Dawn.
{1}{B}{G}, Remove three counters from Chief Striking Dawn: Return a permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: Dawn's ability doesn't target. The card she reanimates will be chosen on resolution.

cards.originalText:
Deception {B} ({B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)

cards.name: Haide Bankbuster
cards.originalText:
[+1]: Haide Bankbuster deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
[+1]: Draw two cards unless any player has Haide Bankbuster deal 3 damage to them.
[-9]: Until end of turn, gain control of all permanents target player controls and they gain haste. Untap those permanents.

cards.flavor: “The town of Nightrail harbors criminals and murders Judges. Nightrail’s existence can no longer be tolerated.”
cards.name: Haphazard Militia
cards.originalText: If one or more counters would be put on a permanent you control, you may have that many counters plus one or that many counters minus one put on that permanent instead.

cards.flavor: “Rumors of this criminal are simple hysteria. Persons attempting to collect a bounty on any invisible entity will be charged with the crimes brought against it.”
cards.name: Invisible Stalker
cards.originalText:
Hexproof
Invisible Stalker can't be blocked.

cards.name: Peakpoint Presence
cards.originalText:
Menace
When Peakpoint Presence enters the battlefield, add {R}{R}. Peakpoint Presence deals 2 damage to you.

rulings.text: The land sacrifice isn't optional. If you can't sacrifice a land for some reason, you won't get the mana.

cards.text:

cards.name: Penny and Pete
cards.originalText: Whenever Penny and Pete attacks, gain control of up to one target noncreature permanent and up to one target creature until end of turn. Untap the noncreature permanent, then tap the creature. It's attacking.

rulings.text: This doesn't trigger any "When this creature attacks" abilities.

cards.text: Whenever Penny and Pete attacks, gain control of up to one target noncreature permanent and up to one target creature until end of turn. Untap the noncreature permanent, then tap the creature. It's attacking.

cards.name: Roxite of Nightrail
cards.originalText:
Each Rogue you control can't be blocked by creatures with greater power than it.
Whenever a Rogue deals combat damage to a player, gain control of target nonland permanent that player controls unless that player pays {1}.
